Lyric:
[by:Evan__1989]
[00:00.59]Once I was seven years old, my mama told me
[00:05.13]Go make yourself some friends or you'll be lonely
[00:08.57]Once I was seven years old

[00:16.23]It was a big big world, but we thought we were bigger
[00:20.83]Pushing each other to the limits, we were learning quicker
[00:24.97]By eleven smoking herb and drinking burning liquor
[00:28.86]Never rich so we were out to make that steady figure

[00:32.79]Once I was eleven years old, my daddy told me
[00:37.10]Go get yourself a wife or you'll be lonely
[00:40.45]Once I was eleven years old

[00:48.85]I always had that dream like my daddy before me
[00:52.85]So I started writing songs, I started writing stories
[00:57.02]Something about that glory, just always seemed to bore me
[01:00.97]Cause only those I really love will ever really know me

[01:04.84]Once I was twenty years old, my story got told
[01:09.21]Before the morning sun, when life was lonely
[01:12.52]Once I was twenty years old.once I was twenty years old

[01:20.50]Soon we'll be 30 years old, our songs have been sold
[01:25.25]We've traveled around the world and we're still roaming
[01:28.59]Soon we'll be 30 years old

[01:36.63]I'm still learning about life
[01:38.96]My woman brought children for me
[01:40.90]So I can sing them all my songs
[01:43.19]And I can tell them stories
[01:44.93]Most of my boys are with me
[01:46.81]Some are still out seeking glory
[01:48.88]And some I had to leave behind
[01:50.98]My brother I'm still sorry

[01:52.71]Soon I'll be 60 years old, will I think the world is cold
[01:57.05]Or will I have a lot of children who can warm me?
[02:00.61]Soon I'll be 60 years old
[02:08.58]Soon I'll be 60 years old, will I think the world is cold
[02:13.14]Or will I have a lot of children who can warm me?
[02:16.55]Soon I'll be 60 years old

[02:24.53]Once I was seven years old
